trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBFST072_00386_SEQ_00<tab>Waltheof, a local at the Mirror Planks, wants you to help deliver goods that have been unloaded at the pier.
TEXT_SUBFST072_00386_SEQ_01<tab>Waltheof has asked that you help deliver newly arrived goods to their respective owners. Start by collecting the cargo from the end of the pier.

TEXT_SUBFST072_00386_SEQ_02<tab>Deliver the goods to their owners. The suit of unworn plate mail belongs to Daranmert, the Mun<var 1F /var>Tuy beans to Kyleigh, and the smoked crayfish balls to Berthe.
TEXT_SUBFST072_00386_SEQ_03<tab>You have delivered all of the goods. Report to Waltheof.
TEXT_SUBFST072_00386_SEQ_04<tab>Waltheof is pleased with the alacrity of your deliveries. Now that the pier is free of obstructions, the next boatload of cargo can be unloaded with a minimum of fuss.
TEXT_SUBFST072_00386_TODO_00<tab>Pick up the goods at the end of the pier.
TEXT_SUBFST072_00386_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the goods.
TEXT_SUBFST072_00386_TODO_02<tab>Report to Waltheof.
TEXT_SUBFST072_00386_WALTHEOF_000_1<tab>Ah, perfect. You're just in time to help deliver some goods that arrived not moments ago.

TEXT_SUBFST072_00386_WALTHEOF_000_2<tab>Allow me to double-check my manifest... Ahem, now listen carefully. Take the suit of plate mail to Daranmert─he's the guard you see right over there. The Mun<var 1F /var>Tuy beans belong to Kyleigh, and the smoked crayfish balls to my friend Berthe here. That's it for this load.

TEXT_SUBFST072_00386_WALTHEOF_000_3<tab>A strapping adventurer like you should barely work up a sweat, am I right? The cargo you're looking for hasn't moved since they unloaded it at the end of the pier. Much obliged.
TEXT_SUBFST072_00386_WALTHEOF_000_71<tab>All done then? Excellent work─swift and sure. Adventurers are such handy individuals to have around.

TEXT_SUBFST072_00386_WALTHEOF_000_72<tab>If we leave cargo piled up on the pier, the next crew has no room to unload their shipment, you see. It can be backbreaking work, but <var 1A 02 /var>someone<var 1A 01 /var> has to do it.
TEXT_SUBFST072_00386_BERTHE_000_11<tab>One, two, three... No, this won't do at all. I'm sure I heard Waltheof mention the shipment had─
TEXT_SUBFST072_00386_BERTHE_000_12<tab>Oh, why thank you very much! It would have been a short afternoon of fishing if this bait hadn't arrived.
TEXT_SUBFST072_00386_KEILEIGH_000_21<tab>They should be here by now...

TEXT_SUBFST072_00386_KEILEIGH_000_22<tab>Hm? Are these the Mun<var 1F /var>Tuy beans? Praise the Matron! It's my job to pick up provisions from the pier and deliver them to the settlements in the area, but I couldn't leave without the beans.
TEXT_SUBFST072_00386_KEILEIGH_000_23<tab>Now I can finish loading up my cart and be on my way. Thank you for your help!
TEXT_SUBFST072_00386_DARANMERT_000_31<tab>Hm? You have something for me?

TEXT_SUBFST072_00386_DARANMERT_000_32<tab>Oof. What is─? Ah, my new plate mail. And what would a Wood Wailer want with metal armor, you ask? Let's just say that after a number of engagements with Garlean heavy infantry, my mind has been opened to the protection such steel encasements can provide.
